Personal Statement

I am a front-end developer with 9 years product and agency experience looking take the next step in my career. I am passionate about website performance, learning and applying new technologies in projects.

  • Internet of Things (Raspberry Pi)

  • Cross browser and device debugging
  • Git / continuous deployment
  • User Experience, Usability, and Accessibility

  • WordPress development (bespoke theme, plugin and functionality)
